title: Professional Summary
text:
This website has been created for my class, AD688 (Cloud Analytics), which is towards my MSc in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University.
If you would like to contact me, please feel free to email me: bdegouw@bu.edu

title: Bowen de Gouw’s Website
text:
Kia Ora, Thank you for visting my website!
I was originally born in the Netherlands, but grew up in Auckland, New Zealand. I attended one of New Zealand’s most successful boys-only high schools, where my passions for both academics and athletics flourished.
In my final year at Westlake Boys High School, I was rewarded with an Athlethic Scholarship to Boston University as Member of the Men’s Rowing Team. At the age of 18, I packed my bags chasing the goal of receiving a high-quality education and competing at the highest collegiate level.
After 4 rigorous and demanding years as a Student-Athlete and Team Captain, I graduated from Boston University’s Questrom School of Business in May 2025
Post-graduation, I wanted to develop a more technical analytical skillset, so I began working towards my Masters of Science in Applied Business Analytics in the Summer of 2025. I currently have an expected Graduation of May 2026.
As a STEM-designated course, my focus will be on applying my undergraduate Business background on real-world tools and methods, including predictive modeling, data mining, cloud platforms, machine learning and generative AI.





Celebrating my Graduation from Boston University’s DeWolfe Boathouse, May 2025








Preparing for the Inter-Collegiate Rowing Association (IRA) National Championships, May 2025





Based in Boston, MA
LinkedIn - Github - Email
